name: Medieval Creatures
description:
Creatures that appeared in a desolate, abandoned, cold village. They get stronger as time goes on. Especially in the blood moon. Can you overcome these creatures?

W,A,S,D - Arrow Keys
Space - Jump
Right Mouse Click - Speed Power
Q - Overpowered
R - Ulti

Logic of the Game:

There are 13 waves in total. Blood moon comes in the 10th wave, and the Boss in the 13th wave.
You must not die until you defeat the boss.
Speed Power, recharges in 40 seconds.
Overpowered and Ulti, fills up as they damage creatures.

Size: 3.4 GB
Zip File
